data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 746 believers in Vesturland, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vesturland, Iceland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 746 believers in Vesturland, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Vesturland, Iceland.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help your children in Vesturland, Iceland find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Vesturland, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Thai, Isan people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Thai, Isan people know you.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 16,800 people living in the state of Vesturland.
Lord, the the state of Vesturland will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vesturland, Iceland has a population of 16,800.

We estimate Vesturland has 746 people who might know Jesus, 14,421 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,632 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Vesturland, Iceland that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
